comment.author: hammett
comment.text: Your config is wrong. The <interceptors> node needs to be on the component to be intercepted.

comment.author: gplumb
comment.text:
Ahh - I was under the impression that if I was to attach an interceptor against a top-level object, that its dependencies would also be intercepted!
Problem solved - Thank you! G
